name: Homemade Chocolate Syrup and Milk
description: Read more about this recipe here....

recipeInstructions.text: Mix sugar and cocoa together in a bowl. Add water and salt.
Pour mixture into a pot and bring mixture to a boil. Stir constantly. You'll start to feel a difference in the consistency of the mixture. When it's thick, remove from heat and let cool.

Add a heaping tablespoon to a glass of ice-cold milk. You're going to want to stir with the cadence of a fast-moving foxtrot. You hear the spoon making a light clinking sound. This And it's saying: guess what you're going to be drinking soon. Guess what you're going to be drinking soon. Over and over. Drink and enjoy!
